title: Criticism of the Bible - Collection 36
description:
Criticism of the Bible - Collection 36:

We have 30 titles here:

-  Abse - Old Testament Stories with a Freudian Twist (2011)

-  Baker - Hollow Men, Strange Women; Riddles, Codes and Otherness in the Book of Judges (2016)

-  Bauckham et al (Eds.) - Old Testament Pseudepigrapha; More Noncanonical Scriptures, Vol. 1 (2013)

-  Berg - Bible Contradictions, Do They Exist; Judge for Yourself (2011)

-  Burr - Self-Contradictions of the Bible (1860)

-  Charlesworth (Ed.) - The Old Testament Pseudepigrapha; Vol. 1, Apocalyptic Literature & Testaments (1983)

-  Charlesworth (Ed.) - The Old Testament Pseudepigrapha; Vol.2, Expansions of the Old Testaments and Legends,.. (1985)

-  De Jonge - The Testaments of the Twelve Patriarchs; a Critical Edition of the Greek Text (1978)

-  DiTommaso - The Book of Daniel and the Apocryphal Daniel Literature (2005)

-  Duff - Moses in Corinth; the Apologetic Context of 2 Corinthians 3 (2015)

-  Green & Baker - Recovering the Scandal of the Cross; Atonement in New Testament and Contemporary Context (2000)

-  Gutierrez - The Bible Dilemma; Historical Contradictions, Misquoted Statements, Failed Prophecies and Oddities in the Bible (2009)

-  Helmer & Landmesser (Eds.) - One Scripture or Many; Canon from Biblical, Theological, and Philosophical Perspectives (2004)

-  Hoffman - And God Said; How Translations Conceal the Bible's Original Meaning (2010)

-  Jenkins - The Many Faces of Christ; the Thousand Year Story of the Survival and Influence of the Lost Gospels (2015)

-  Knoppers & Levinson (Eds.) - The Pentateuch as Torah; New Models for Understanding Its Promulgation and Acceptance (2007)

-  Lewis - Reflections on the Psalms (1958)

-  Manser - Critical Companion to the Bible; a Literary Reference (2009)

-  Martin - Multiple Originals; New Approaches to Hebrew Bible Textual Criticism (2010)

-  McKenzie & Graham (Eds.) - The Hebrew Bible Today; an Introduction to Critical Issues (1998)

-  Pagels - Beyond Belief; the Secret Gospel of Thomas (1998)

-  Powell - The Unfinished Gospel; Notes on the Quest for the Historical Jesus (1994)

-  Price - Inerrant the Wind; the Evangelical Crisis of Biblical Authority (2009)

-  Roncace - Raw Revelation; the Bible They Never Tell You About (2012)

-  Sommer - Revelation and Authority; Sinai in Jewish Scripture and Tradition (2015)

-  Tigay - The Lost Book of Moses; the Hunt for the World's Oldest Bible (2016)

-  Tov - Textual Criticism of the Hebrew Bible, Qumran, Septuagint; Collected Essays, Vol. 3 (2015)

-  Walton - The Lost World of Adam and Eve; Genesis 2-3 and the Human Origins Debate (2015)

-  Webster - Holy Scripture; a Dogmatic Sketch (2003)

-  West - The Stolen Bible; From Tool of Imperialism to African Icon (2016)
